features: Toddler-sized kid's bookshelf displays books with covers facing forward for easy identification.
Four deep fabric storage pockets stow reading books, board books, coloring books and magazines of all shapes and sizes.
Sturdy engineered wood construction is easy to assemble and clean. Includes all hardware.
Space-saving design. Assembled dimensions: 25"W x 11"D x 24"H. Assembled weight: 7 lbs.
Neutral, compact design fits into any room or environment.
Perfect for book storage in your toddler’s bedroom, playroom, nursery, or the living room.
body.description: The space-saving, toddler-sized Humble Crew Kids Bookshelf 4 Tier Book Organizer is the perfect storage solution for your little one's favorite collection of books. Our bookcase displays books with covers facing forward, making identification and retrieval easy for children. This bookrack features a versatile wood finish and four deep fabric storage pockets for reading books, board books, coloring books and magazines of all shapes and sizes. In a contemporary and stylish design, it is sure to complement your home's existing furniture. This space-saving bookshelf is sized just right for your toddler and is ideal for children aged 3 and up. Made with sturdy engineered wood construction, it is easy to assemble and clean. All hardware is included. Assembled dimensions— 25"W x 11"D x 24"H

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Furnish it. Organize it. Store it. Love it! Choose Humble Crew We're parents who design products for kids just like our own— naturally, safety is our #1 priority. We have millions of products in families' homes and each is tested to the highest standard. We started as the leading storage organizer brand, being the first manufacturer to produce Super Sized and Extra Large storage organizers. We've since expanded our product catalog to provide families with comprehensive solutions for kids furniture, storage and play spaces. To date, we've sold millions of items across our catalog in the 25 years we've been in business, with over 50,000 reviews and an average 4.5 star rating. We’re committed not only to making well-designed essentials for your home, but to making a difference. Our reputation as a company is built by focusing on creating products with a purpose: to turn homes into havens of comfort and style while helping make life better for others through our educational scholarships and charitable giving.

Features to Love Kid-Sized Just the right height for children to identify, retrieve and put away their books all on their own. Rounded Corners We know accidents happen— that’s why all of the corners on our bookracks are rounded. In case of a stumble, your child is protected from sharp edges that could hurt them. Easy Cleaning Kids are messy but keeping this bookrack squeaky clean is easy, even if your little one is particularly messy! Simply wipe surfaces clean with water and soap. Room for Everything 4 deep pockets means your child can grow their library while everything is still visible and easily accessible.

Complete Your Collection with the Humble Crew Inspire Collection Inspire Toy Organizer with 16 Bins Kid-sized storage organizer stows your child's toys in easy-to-see, easy-to-access plastic storage bins to help keep their play space clean and tidy. Inspire Wooden Table and 4 Chairs Set Wooden table and 4 chairs set gives your child their very own space to eat, play, create and do schoolwork. Humble Crew's Inpsire Collection Inspire Collection's contemporary colorway balances style with functionality to perfectly complete your child's space and seamlessly match your existing décor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buying a second one now, this is great!
reviews.reviewText: This bookshelf is super cute! When we bought it originally it was missing the hardware (things happen, I’m not upset). I called the company and the sweet lady on the phone gave me directions on how to order the missing parts from them. They sent them out and we were still able to get it put together a week before Christmas! It is small, which may be a downside for some, but it’s a positive for us. It went together in about five minutes flat, is super lightweight, super cute, and is sturdy enough to trust my toddler around. It holds about 24 children’s books, if anyone’s wondering. We are ordering a second one now for all of the new books my baby got for Christmas!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great book case
reviews.reviewText: This book holder was easy to install, all you need is a phillips star or flat screwdriver. I put it together in like 5 minutes. The size is not too big, doesn't take up alot of space in the room and looks pleasing aesthetically. Easy for my 15 month old to grab a book and replace it when done. I would definitely recommend this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, reliable, good capacity
reviews.reviewText: I’ve repurchased twice as my toddler’s library keeps growing. Can be placed adjacent to one another without gaps. Fits a surprising number of books of different shapes and sizes. Easy for kiddo to pull books out and put them back in, as well. The shelves are poly fabric slings and is one piece of material that you string the included metal poles through to create the different layers. The wood side panels are composite painted white, not solid wood. Everything you need is included, except for a basic screwdriver to get the screws tight once assembled. I’ve assembled these myself in about five minutes. When against the wall there’s some space between the sling and the wall in case you have an outlet there it won’t touch. When it’s filled with books I’ve never been concerned with or had one topple bc the leg base is wide, but if you wanted to you could wall mount from each end (wall mount not included). It’s not fancy but it’s solid and hasn’t failed us yet in 1.5 years. The pastel is colorful but not loud. You can see the screws from the outside but if that bothers you then order some of those white sticker screw covers. Honestly love these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy and strong
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and holds a lot of books of all shapes and sizes. A LOT of books. It appears small, but it worked wonders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, simple bookcase
reviews.reviewText: This bookcase is perfect for my 19month old. She loves to get the books out and put them up on her own. The pastel colors are super cute and it was very easy to put together. It has held up well and can take some leaning on and having toys pushed into it. It’s great for the price you pay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bookshelf for kids!!
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to put together and maybe took 20 minutes tops! Holds so many books and is super sturdy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great book stand for kids books
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and holds books of all size. It think we got about 25 books on it. Feels sturdy. We will see how long the fabric last.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute, easy to put together, doesn't hold many books
reviews.reviewText: Product came on time, was very easy to put togeth, Colors match picture and it seems pretty sturdy. Only down fall is it doesn't hold many books, we fit most of ours but I had to stack them a certain way and my 3 year old won't be able to put them away herself.Overall, I wouldn't purchase had I known the amount of books that would fit easily. But if you don't have many board books its a pretty, sturdy book shelf!
El producto es exactamente como está en la foto, es muy bonito, fácil de montar y la verdad a mi niña le gustó bastante. Es chico (altura) pero si quedan varios libros.
Esta súper bonito un color bien neutro y poquito frágil pero muy funcional

Perfect size for a toddler.Sturdy and aesthetically pleasing.Fits a lot more books than I thought it would!Easy to assemble and clear instructions (if you even need them- very obvious to put together).

reviews.reviewTitle: Great value, looks perfect, holds a lot of books.
reviews.reviewText: This bookshelf has the perfect look and feel for a children's room. The colors are playful, it's easy to install/setup, and it holds a surprising number of books thanks to its flexible fabric design.
Mi aspettavo qualcosa di più solido e resistente. I pannelli sono di un tessuto morbido, non so quanto reggeranno.
